channel.title: Publishing on Elise Volkman

item.title: The Nymph Keepers Trilogy
item.description:
Nym is the last living nymph in the province of Galia, and Jay is out for her blood.

I write fantasy and science fiction and have a flair for gothic drama. The Nymph Keepers trilogy is my debut ebook series about Forest, a nymph whose people have been hunted to near-extinction for the healing properties in their blood. Jay needs nymph blood to help his sister, and Forest is supposed to be his solution to everything. Instead, Jayâ€™s convictions war with his loyalties and he saves her from certain death, becoming a mercenary on the run in the process.
